text: same here, if there is a value assign to attachedStylesheets property, the template won't upload
I'm currently getting an error when uploading a template (x.template.json) using the HubSpot CLI if there is a css defined in the attachedStylesheet property.

Yes, agreed here too. For some reason it seems intermittent. I removed the attachedstyles object from the json file, uploaded, manually set the assets, then fetched it, which seemed to allow reuploading it, however, it seems very inconsistent.
Just another note that could be related, it seems to create "folders" rather than "files" for the template files:
